title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Competencies: Designing Effective Instructional Strategies for Transitioning to Online Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic online learning tools and advanced knowledge in the field of study
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can suggest at least three instructional designs that effectively integrate synchronous and asynchronous activities in online environments
Learners can identify and resolve at least two technical and pedagogical barriers when converting traditional face-to-face materials into online learning modules
Learners can design hybrid assessment tools (e.g., quizzes, discussions, projects) to measure learner engagement in blended environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
